name: Phaselabs
description:
In this game you inspect Placeswher phenomens took place. Find evidence, collect samples and set up gear.  Earn xp and money from succesful missions and usethem to upgrade your character, base and buy new stuff. But always keep an eye on your sanity, bc if you pass out you will not only loose the contract, but your carried items too.

Do quests to earn more rewards and unlock story parts.

Versions:
